headline: Tullow Oil Exits Gabon, Announces Asset Sale Worth $300 Million
summary: TUWOY notes that the sale of its Gabonese assets is beneficial to both the company and its shareholders. TUWOY plans to retain its focus on its core assets in Ghana.

raw.headline: Tullow Oil Exits Gabon, Announces Asset Sale Worth $300 Million
raw.summary: TUWOY notes that the sale of its Gabonese assets is beneficial to both the company and its shareholders. TUWOY plans to retain its focus on its core assets in Ghana.

headline: GeoPark Exits Vaca Muerta Deal, Focuses on Strategic Growth Plans
summary: GPRK halts its Vaca Muerta acquisition, reaffirming its strategy of focused, value-driven growth across Latin America.

raw.headline: GeoPark Exits Vaca Muerta Deal, Focuses on Strategic Growth Plans
raw.summary: GPRK halts its Vaca Muerta acquisition, reaffirming its strategy of focused, value-driven growth across Latin America.
